p: All solvents or analytical standards such as 2,2-diphenyl-picrylhydrazyl (DPPH) stable radical, Trolox™, Folin–Ciocalteu reagent, gallic acid, nordihydroguaiaretic acid (NDGA), dimethyl sulfoxide (DMSO), trichloroacetic acid (TCA) and sodium chloride (NaCl), were purchased from Sigma-Aldrich, Chemie GmbH (Taufkirchen, Germany). For gas chromatography (GC), helium gas was purchased from Afoi Thomadaki (Thessaloniki, Greece).
